views.markdown:
Customize the Twitter app UI

features include
• System UI Color
• Link Colors
• Retweeted Button Color
• Hearted Button Color
• Messages
  • Custom Bubble corner radius
  • incoming and outgoing Bubble Background Colors
  • incoming and outgoing Bubble Text Colors

Lots more coming soon :)

Default Color is green

Configure options from Settings.

Consider.

0.0.4-9 - fixes for "High Contrast" and "Light out". 0.0.4-8 - fixed incompatibilities with latest twitter app. 0.0.4-4
• fixed navbar/tabbar shadow in Nightmode
• fixed thread connector not being tinted
0.0.4-3
• Nightmode is now Customizable.
0.0.4-2
- fixed selected DM backgrounds
0.0.4-1
• added support for the latest version of twitter
• dropped support for legacy/outdated versions of twitter
• remove obsolete features now implemented by twitter (round profile pic, tabbar stuff, ect)
0.0.3-8
• added message bubble borders
• "bubble background colors" now uses alpha (for the bubble borders to just show)
• "Round Profile Pic" is now disabled by default
0.0.3-7
- bug fixes

- updated for Twitter 7.0
0.0.3-5

• moved the "Hide text input backgrounds" switch from "messages" to "Additional settings" as it now hides all text input backgrounds
